name: Mums Cellar
description:
------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Intro

When the light in the cellar is broken and you can only see something with a torch. As a child, this fear was even stronger, because you imagined something scary in every object. In this game, you have the opportunity to travel back in time and relive that paranoid moment.Can you manage not to disappoint your mother by bringing her all the items she wants from you?

------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Mission

You have to go to the Dark Cellar and bring the items your mother asked for. But beware, your own fear of evil creatures might make it harder for you.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Credits:

jo_kil - Dev

Cinnazeyy - Dev

(Hohi - minor Dev help)

(BlackDiamond334 - minor Dev help)

Waggiswagen - Music

Almost all assets were made by us. (Music, some Sound-effects, Models) only 2-3 Textures and Sound-effects are not made by us.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------
